synopsis.text:
Attractors, humans with supernatural abilities, are the focus of this thrilling anime, with Quon, a determined boy, at its helm. Quon and his fellow Attractors are in the crosshairs of a clandestine organization, but that's not their only challenge. A series of murders, marked by eerie flower drawings, sweeps through the city, hinting at a sinister new Attractor with a unique ability to communicate with plants.

As the Attractors at Fantasium Garden welcome new members, a mysterious string of flower-connected murders comes to their attention. The Custos, a formidable force, are quick to suspect an Attractor as the culprit and move in for the elimination. However, Quon, steadfast in his resolve to protect all Attractors, plans a daring rescue mission.

With the stakes higher than ever, Quon must navigate this complex situation and confront the secretive new Attractor. Will Quon's unwavering determination be enough to save an Attractor who is also a serial murderer? Or will his principles be tested to the breaking point? Only time will tell in this gripping tale of power, secrecy, and the struggle for survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
